participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nostalgic, enjoys sharing experiences and creating a welcoming atmosphere.
participant_1.background: I like to eat at the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood. My wife is a stay-at-home mom and my kids are all in school. I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon. I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks. I could have been a barista, but I'm happy with my life as it is.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Casual and optimistic, enjoys life despite the messiness and values personal accomplishments.
participant_2.background: I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway. I live in the city of Grand Rapids, Michigan. My favorite player is Mike Trout. I collect memories of my accomplishments. I like to look my best even when I'm at work.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I'm just getting ready for work.
Oh nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a barista at a local coffee shop.
Yeah, it's my favorite drink. I love trying different types of coffee beans.
I'm not very good at making coffee, but I love to drink it.
You should come to my coffee shop sometime! I'll make you a great cup of coffee.
I will! I'm free this weekend.
